select t1.branchcode, (select branchname from ba_branchmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode) as branchname, t1.deptcode, (select deptname from ba_deptmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode and deptcode = t1.deptcode) as deptname, (select dcodename from sy_ccodedtl where ccode = '003' and dcode = t1.grade) as grade, (select dcodename from sy_ccodedtl where ccode = '004' and dcode = t1.duty) as duty, (case t1.employgubun when 'R' then '정규' when 'F' then '프리' end) as employgubun, t1.insacode, t1.kname, (select kname from hr_insamst where insacode = t1.recoid) as reconame, t1.joindate, t1.remark from hr_insamst t1 where 1=1
and t1.joindate between #S_JOINDATE_FR# and #S_JOINDATE_TO#
and t1.branchcode = #S_BRANCHCODE#
and t1.deptcode = #S_DEPTCODE#
and t1.kname like '%$S_KNAME$%'
and t1.juminid '%$S_JUMINID$%'
and t1.retiredate is NULL order by t1.branchcode, t1.deptcode, t1.kname

select (select branchname from ba_branchmst where branchcode = t1.branchcode) as o_branchname, t1.joindate as o_joindate, t1.retiredate as o_retiredate, (case t1.employgubun when 'R' then '정규' when 'F' then '프리' end) as o_employgubun from hr_insamst t1 where 1=1
and t1.insacode = #INSACODE#
and t1.retiredate is not NULL order by t1.joindate asc
select sum(t2.sellamt) as o_sellamt from sa_salemst t1, sa_saledtl t2 where 1=1 and t1.salercd = #INSACODE# and t1.saledate between #O_JOINDATE# and #O_RETIREDATE# and t1.saleid = t2.saleid
